review: Very nice case for the price.  Solid construction and perfect fit and protection for my Epiphone LP.  Would definately recommend.
Works like the picture shows.  Hangers adjust to required width of head stock.  Wood finish is nice look on the wall.
Guitar pics, what more can I say.  Nice feel and look.  Never can have enough because they seem to be prone to theft! :)
This thing works great.  Tiny and seems to be accurate.  The price is darn good as well.  A must for all guitarists.

Not knowing much, and after using for a couple of months, I'm pretty happy with guitar for the money I paid for it.  Fit and finish is quite nice.  Just needed tuning.  Great beginner model.  Feels solid and stay's in tune after the first 4 or 5 practice sessions.
